ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger chilled lemon-lime soda per serving
des: "Shots of Caribbean rum, grape schnapps, and lemon-lime soda. I'm not sure where the recipe originated, but it's delicious! If you prefer less alcohol, grape juice or soda may be used in place of the grape schnapps."
ins: Fill a glass with ice. Pour in coconut rum, grape schnapps, and chilled lemon-lime soda. Stir and enjoy!
